post.title: Web Part RSS Client
post.content: I’m looking forward to seeing Simon Fell’sRSS Web Parts. Makes a nice addition to WSS RSS (which does work in SPS as well). I haven’t had any time to pick through the new .NET Web Parts technology – I’m hoping Simon releases code for his RSS web parts.
post.excerpt: I’m looking forward to seeing Simon Fell’sRSS Web Parts. Makes a nice addition to WSS RSS (which does work in SPS as well). I haven’t had any time to pick through the new .NET Web Parts technology – I’m hoping Simon releases code for his RSS web parts.
